oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pioneer Rhythm Boys - WHFB - 1949-02-26
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pioneer Rhythm Boys radio show for station WHFB, Benton Harbor, MI. Originally broadcast Saturday February 26, 1949 at 11:30 am. Featuring Clark Reed (announcer), Eddie Skates (host), and (verbally identified) band members Bud 'The Deacon' Wheeler, Ray 'The Professor' Watkins, Butch, and Earl (presumably Gulley). Sponsored by Bill's Auto Service and Super Save-Way Market.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pioneer Rhythm Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (Clark Reed) -- Opening statement (Eddie Skates) -- Eddie Skates introduces Deacon -- Then I Turned And Walked Slowly Away -- Bill's Auto Service commercial (Clark Reed) -- Eddie Skates introduces Earl -- Spanish Two Step -- Eddie Skates introduces Butch -- That Little Boy Of Mine -- Super Save-Way commercial (Clark Reed) -- Eddie Skates introduces the Professor -- Hawaiian Honeymoon -- Theme -- Closing statement (Eddie Skates) -- Closing statement (Clark Reed)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WHFB (Radio station : Benton Harbor, Mich.); Pioneer Rhythm Boys
